thread.title: Kim Jong Un's trip to China shown on state TV

title: Kim Jong Un's trip to China shown on state TV
text:
Kim Jong Un's trip to China shown on state TV 10:05am BST - 01:24 
North Korea's state media release a video of its leader Kim Jong Un heading to China by train, on Kim's first known trip outside North Korea since he assumed power in 2011. No reporter narration. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
North Korea's state media release a video of its leader Kim Jong Un heading to China by train, on Kim's first known trip outside North Korea since he assumed power in 2011. No reporter narration.
